LOGIN_LABEL_LOGIN_ERROR_MESSAGE_KEY: Niste autorizirani ili je vaša sesija istekla. Molimo prijavite se.
MESSAGE_START_OPENMRS: OpenNMS usluga trenutno nije dostupna. Molimo provjerite da li je servis pokrenut i osvježite stranicu nakon što je pokrenut.
LOGIN_LABEL_MAX_FAILED_ATTEMPTS: Broj pogrešnih OTP pokušaja  premašen. Molimo, prijavite se ponovo.
LOGIN_LABEL_OTP_EXPIRED: Vaš OTP je istekao. Molimo, prijavite se ponovo.
LOGIN_LABEL_RESEND_SUCCESS: Novi OTP je poslan na vaš registrirani broj.
LOGIN_LABEL_MAX_RESEND_ATTEMPTS: Broj pokušaja ponovno poslanih OTPa je premašen. Molimo, prijavite se ponovo.
PASSWORD_DOESNOT_MATCH_WITH_NEW_PASSWORD: Confirm Password doesn't match with new password.
PASSWORD_SHOULD_CONTAIN_DIGITS: Should contain at least one number
PASSWORD_SHOULD_BE_A_MIX_OF_BOTH_UPPER_C: Should be a mix of both upper and lower-case letters
PASSWORD_SHOULD_HAVE_ATLEAST_ONE_NON_DIG: Should contain at least one non digit character
CHANGE_PASSWORD_DOES_NOT_SUPPORT: We don’t support this feature for now, please contact administrator.
YOU_HAVE_NOT_BEEN_SETUP_PROVIDER: You have not been setup as a Provider, please contact administrator.
COULD_NOT_GET_PROVIDER: Could not get provider for the current user.
WARNING_SERVER_TIME_ZONE_MISMATCH: The server timezone ({{serverTime}}) is different from your browser's time/timezone ({{localeTimeZone}}). This can cause some data or reports to appear incorrect. Please contact the administrator for further assistance.
LOGIN_UNSUPPORTED_BROWSER_KEY: Bahmni is supported on Chrome/Firefox Browser
PRIVILEGE_REQUIRED: User is logged in but doesn't have the relevant privilege
NO_FULFILMENT_MESSAGE: No observations captured for this order.
SELECT_VALUE_FROM_AUTOCOMPLETE_DEFAULT_M: Please select a value from auto complete
